About Dachshund Dash

Our Game

Dachshund Dash is a playful twist on the classic snake game. Instead of a snake, you guide an adorable dachshund through a fun adventure, collecting tasty bones along the way! The goal is simple: grow as long as you can without running into yourself or the walls. Designed for both desktop and mobile, this game brings a bit of charm and nostalgia with a modern, light-hearted feel.

A Short History of Snake Games

The original Snake game became famous in the late 1970s, first appearing on arcade machines. It gained worldwide popularity in the 1990s when it was preloaded on Nokia mobile phones — almost everyone who owned a Nokia has played it at least once! Simple yet addictive, Snake captured the magic of growing your "tail" and dodging obstacles, creating a timeless formula that inspired countless versions and reimaginings, including Dachshund Dash!
